" }, "$:/plugins/can/omnitools/stylesheet": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omnitools/stylesheet", "created": "20200916002933664", "modified": "20200916003007571", "tags": "$:/tags/Stylesheet", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "text": "/* for omnitools */ .omni-bookmark-button { display: flex; flex-direction: row; border-radius: 3px; align-self: flex-start; margin-bottom: 0.4em; } .omni-pill-lhs { /* border-radius: 1em 0 0 1em; */ margin-right: 0; border: none; background-color: none; } .omni-pill-rhs { /* border-radius: 0 1em 1em 0; */ margin-left: 0; border: none; background-color: none; } div.omnitools-buttons { display: flex; flex-direction: column; } .tc-sidebar-tab-open .tc-btn-mini.omnitools-closebutton svg { fill: none; } .tc-sidebar-tab-open .omnitools-closebutton.bookmark-button-open svg { fill: #ffaaaa; } .omni-search-input { width: 10em; } div.omni-info-panel { background-color: #eee;}" }, "$:/plugins/can/omnitools/infopanelold": { "title": "$:/plugins/can/omnitools/infopanelold", "tags": "", "list-after": "", "text": "\define makefoldstate() $:/state/omnitools/$(currentTiddler)$-infofold <$list filter="[all[current]!tag[omnibus]]" variable="null">
